name: Discover Ammo
description:
Welcome to my GMTK Game Jam 2019 Submission.

This is a space shooter where you only have 1 health and your weapon can only hold 1 bullet in its hull. Your job is to dodge enemy fire and pickup ammunition to help you survive.

Use (W), (A), (S), and (D) to move, and (Spacebar) to shoot.

Thank you for playing my game.
